Detailed Description

Interface to the SMI/MDIO hardware, including support for both IEEE 802.3 clause 22 and clause 45 operations.

Revision
95160

Function Documentation

static cvmx_smix_rd_dat_t __cvmx_mdio_read_rd_dat ( int  bus_id  )  [inline, static]

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Function to read SMIX_RD_DAT and check for timeouts. This code sequence is done fairly often, so put in in one spot.

Parameters:
bus_id SMI/MDIO bus to read
Returns:
Value of SMIX_RD_DAT. pending will be set on a timeout.
static void __cvmx_mdio_set_clause22_mode ( int  bus_id  )  [inline, static]
static void __cvmx_mdio_set_clause45_mode ( int  bus_id  )  [inline, static]
static int cvmx_mdio_45_read ( int  bus_id,
int  phy_id,
int  device,
int  location 
) [inline, static]

Perform an IEEE 802.3 clause 45 MII read.

This function is used to read PHY registers controlling auto negotiation.

Parameters:
bus_id MDIO bus number. Zero on most chips, but some chips (ex CN56XX) support multiple busses.
phy_id The MII phy id
device MDIO Managable Device (MMD) id
location Register location to read
Returns:
Result from the read or -1 on failure
static int cvmx_mdio_45_write ( int  bus_id,
int  phy_id,
int  device,
int  location,
int  val 
) [inline, static]

Perform an IEEE 802.3 clause 45 MII write.

This function is used to write PHY registers controlling auto negotiation.

Parameters:
bus_id MDIO bus number. Zero on most chips, but some chips (ex CN56XX) support multiple busses.
phy_id The MII phy id
device MDIO Managable Device (MMD) id
location Register location to write
val Value to write
Returns:
-1 on error 0 on success
